RW-00-FOOL.name: The Fool
RW-00-FOOL.description: Numbered 0 of the Major Arcana, The Fool stands at the threshold of all journeys. In the Rider–Waite image, a bright sun crowns a sky of possibility as a carefree traveler steps toward a cliff, a white rose of innocence in one hand and a light knapsack over the shoulder. A small white dog leaps at his heels, both warning and blessing, while distant mountains glimmer with untrodden paths. The air is crisp, the world unwritten, and the moment is pure potential — a breath held just before the leap.

meanings.upright: A fresh chapter beckons with trust and open-hearted curiosity. Take the leap, gather only what you need, and let experience be your teacher.
meanings.reversed: Pause before stepping off the edge. Fear, folly, or avoidable risks ask for grounded awareness and a plan.

love.upright: New romance or a playful renewal of an existing bond invites openness and delight.
love.reversed: Rushing in or ignoring red flags may lead to avoidable heartache; slow down and check your footing.

career.upright: A venture, role, or project begins — be bold, learn fast, and trust your initiative.
career.reversed: Impulsive moves or unclear goals could derail progress; clarify direction and prepare.

finance.upright: Opportunity arrives with a light, optimistic touch; start small and stay flexible.
finance.reversed: Risky spending or speculation needs restraint; protect essentials first.

health.upright: Try a fresh routine or joyful movement to revive energy and spirit.
health.reversed: Avoid reckless choices; listen to your body and establish supportive habits.

spiritual.upright: Answer the call of wonder and step into the unknown with faith.
spiritual.reversed: Feeling unmoored signals a need for grounding practices and gentle guidance.

RW-01-MAGICIAN.name: The Magician
RW-01-MAGICIAN.description: Number I of the Major Arcana, The Magician channels heaven to earth. In the Rider–Waite image, he stands before a table set with wand, cup, sword, and pentacle — the four suits and elements — with one hand raised to the sky and the other pointing to the ground, declaring “as above, so below.” An infinity sign hovers over his head, a serpent-belt bites its tail around his waist, and a garden of red roses and white lilies blooms with focused intention. This is the spark of manifestation, skill married to will, and the brilliance of a mind aligned with purpose.

meanings.upright: You have everything needed to bring an idea into form. Focus your will, use your tools, and act with clear intention.
meanings.reversed: Power leaks through distraction or misalignment; beware of smoke and mirrors. Reclaim focus and ethics before proceeding.

love.upright: Magnetic communication and chemistry grow a bond; say what you mean and create what you desire together.
love.reversed: Mixed signals or subtle manipulation erode trust; restore honesty and balanced give-and-take.

career.upright: Pitch, present, and lead — your skills land when delivered with precision and confidence.
career.reversed: Overpromising, disorganization, or office politics drain momentum; refine your message and methods.

finance.upright: Strategic planning and savvy tools help money work for you.
finance.reversed: Beware of schemes or unclear terms; read the fine print and consolidate energy.

health.upright: A focused regimen, expert guidance, and consistent practice yield results.
health.reversed: Scattered approaches or miracle fixes backfire; simplify and commit to one clear plan.

spiritual.upright: Ritual, intention, and mindful action align inner vision with outer reality.
spiritual.reversed: Ego tricks or spiritual bypassing obscure truth; ground your practice in integrity.

RW-02-HIGH_PRIESTESS.name: The High Priestess
RW-02-HIGH_PRIESTESS.description: Number II of the Major Arcana, The High Priestess guards the threshold of inner knowing. In the Rider–Waite image, she sits between the black and white pillars marked B and J, with a veil of pomegranates and palms behind her and the sea glimmering beyond. A lunar crown rests upon her brow, a crescent moon lies at her feet, and a partially hidden scroll marked TORA peeks from her robes. She is silence, mystery, and the cool depth of intuition — the wisdom that arrives when we listen beneath the noise.

meanings.upright: Trust the quiet voice within and observe without forcing. The answer ripens in stillness and reveals itself in time.
meanings.reversed: Intuition is muffled by doubt or noise, and something remains concealed. Step back, clear interference, and ask for truth.

love.upright: A subtle, soulful bond deepens through patience and attentive listening.
love.reversed: Unspoken needs or secrets create distance; invite gentle, honest conversation.

career.upright: Read the room, research quietly, and let insight guide strategic timing.
career.reversed: Office undercurrents and hidden agendas call for boundaries and discernment.

finance.upright: Follow informed intuition; investigate details before committing funds.
finance.reversed: Opaque terms or missing information; delay decisions until clarity is certain.

health.upright: Notice subtle signals and cycles; rest, reflect, and support your nervous system.
health.reversed: Ignoring symptoms or burying stress; seek qualified insight and slow the pace.

spiritual.upright: Meditation, dreams, and sacred study open a quiet doorway to the divine.
spiritual.reversed: Spiritual avoidance or confusion suggests returning to simple, steady practice.

RW-03-EMPRESS.name: The Empress
RW-03-EMPRESS.description: Number III of the Major Arcana, The Empress is the lush heart of creation. In the Rider–Waite card she reclines upon cushions near a field of golden wheat, clad in a pomegranate-patterned gown, with a crown of twelve stars circling her head. A forest and gentle stream flow behind her, and the shield of Venus rests nearby, emblem of love and fertility. She is the warmth of growth, the body’s wisdom, and the art of bringing ideas into abundant life.

meanings.upright: Nurture what you love and let it flourish. Beauty, comfort, and creativity multiply when tended with patience and care.
meanings.reversed: Overgiving or undernourishing throws growth off balance. Refill your own well, remove blocks, and restore natural rhythms.

love.upright: Affection, tenderness, and devotion deepen bonds; prioritize quality time and care.
love.reversed: Clinginess or emotional neglect strains connection; seek balance between giving and receiving.

career.upright: Creative projects blossom through collaboration and steady cultivation.
career.reversed: Burnout or stifled expression; set boundaries and give ideas room to breathe.

finance.upright: Resources grow through sensible stewardship and fertile opportunities.
finance.reversed: Overspending for comfort or scarcity thinking; recalibrate habits and invest in sustainability.

health.upright: Gentle routines, nourishment, and nature support robust wellbeing.
health.reversed: Ignoring body signals or overindulgence; reestablish supportive self-care.

spiritual.upright: Honor embodiment as sacred; creativity becomes a devotional path.
spiritual.reversed: Disconnection from the body dims intuition; return to sensory practices and gratitude.

RW-04-EMPEROR.name: The Emperor
RW-04-EMPEROR.description: Number IV of the Major Arcana, The Emperor anchors order and authority. In the Rider–Waite image, he sits upon a stone throne adorned with rams’ heads, clad in red robes over armor, with barren mountains rising behind him. He holds an orb and an ankh-topped scepter, his crown and white beard signaling seasoned rule and clear command. This is structure, protection, and the confidence to set firm boundaries in service of stability.

meanings.upright: Define the plan, assume responsibility, and lead with steadiness. Systems and strategy bring lasting security.
meanings.reversed: Control without compassion becomes brittle. Loosen the grip, renegotiate power, and rebuild trust.

love.upright: Commitment strengthens through reliability and clear agreements.
love.reversed: Overcontrol or emotional distance harms connection; practice empathy and mutual respect.

career.upright: Step into leadership, set priorities, and create durable frameworks.
career.reversed: Micromanagement or resistance to feedback stalls progress; adapt and delegate.

finance.upright: Prudent planning, budgets, and safeguards produce long-term stability.
finance.reversed: Overly tight control or chaotic spending; balance discipline with flexibility.

health.upright: Structured routines and consistent effort improve strength and resilience.
health.reversed: All-or-nothing approaches backfire; adopt sustainable practices.

spiritual.upright: Ritual and disciplined study ground your path.
spiritual.reversed: Dogmatism constricts growth; make space for humility and discovery.

RW-05-HIEROPHANT.name: The Hierophant
RW-05-HIEROPHANT.description: Number V of the Major Arcana, The Hierophant is the keeper of tradition and sacred teaching. In the Rider–Waite card, a robed figure wearing a triple crown raises a hand in blessing and holds a triple-cross scepter, while two acolytes kneel before him and crossed keys rest at his feet. Pillars frame a sacred space, signaling lineage, doctrine, and the transmission of wisdom. This is the bridge between earth and the holy, inviting learning, community, and meaningful rites.

meanings.upright: Seek counsel from trusted teachers and time-honored methods. Belonging and structure can guide you through complexity.
meanings.reversed: Rules without spirit constrain growth; challenge stale forms and honor your authentic path.

love.upright: Shared values, commitment, and possibly formal milestones strengthen the bond.
love.reversed: Different beliefs or resistance to labels stirs friction; define your own terms together.

career.upright: Mentorship, certification, or established systems advance your role.
career.reversed: Bureaucracy or rigid policy stifles initiative; propose thoughtful reforms or seek a better fit.

finance.upright: Conservative strategies, reputable institutions, and expert advice protect assets.
finance.reversed: Break from unhelpful financial habits or norms; choose approaches aligned with your values.

health.upright: Follow proven protocols and professional guidance for steady progress.
health.reversed: A one-size-fits-all plan may fail; personalize your approach within safe parameters.

spiritual.upright: Study, ritual, and community practice deepen faith and understanding.
spiritual.reversed: Direct experience becomes the teacher; question dogma and listen within.

RW-06-LOVERS.name: The Lovers
RW-06-LOVERS.description: Number VI of the Major Arcana, The Lovers reveal union and choice. In the Rider–Waite scene, the angel Raphael hovers beneath a radiant sun as two figures, reminiscent of Adam and Eve, stand before trees — the serpent coiling around the fruit behind the woman, and flames rising behind the man. A mountain rises between them, suggesting a path that requires conscious alignment. Love, values, and decisions meet under a blessing that asks for wholehearted truth.

meanings.upright: Choose with your whole heart and let your actions reflect your values. Partnership and harmony arise from honest alignment.
meanings.reversed: Mixed motives or fear of choice create tension. Revisit your values and realign before committing.

love.upright: A blessed connection deepens through authenticity, mutual care, and open dialogue.
love.reversed: Crossed signals, triangles, or avoidance of choice strain the bond; clarify needs and boundaries.

career.upright: Collaborations thrive when values match; choose projects that reflect true priorities.
career.reversed: Conflicts of interest or unclear agreements; renegotiate terms or step away.

finance.upright: Make value-based financial decisions, possibly in partnership; harmony supports prosperity.
finance.reversed: Tempting but misaligned offers; avoid choices that compromise core principles.

health.upright: Balanced habits sustained by supportive relationships improve wellbeing.
health.reversed: Inconsistency or self-sabotage calls for recommitment to aligned routines.

spiritual.upright: Union of head and heart opens a path of sacred connection.
spiritual.reversed: Inner division clouds guidance; reconcile conflicting desires through honest reflection.

RW-07-CHARIOT.name: The Chariot
RW-07-CHARIOT.description: Number VII of the Major Arcana, The Chariot triumphs through directed will. In the Rider–Waite card, an armored charioteer stands beneath a starry canopy, crowned with a laurel and star, wielding a wand as two sphinxes — one black, one white — rest poised to pull the vehicle. Crescent moons adorn his shoulders, a square breastplate anchors him, and a city lies behind as he advances toward open roads. Mastery comes from harnessing opposing forces and steering them toward a single aim.

meanings.upright: Claim the reins and move with purpose. Discipline and resolve carry you past obstacles into decisive progress.
meanings.reversed: Forces pull in different directions or will turns forceful; recalibrate, regain balance, and choose your lane.

love.upright: Shared goals and clear boundaries propel the relationship forward.
love.reversed: Power struggles or conflicting priorities stall momentum; slow down and realign intentions.

career.upright: Drive, strategy, and confident leadership deliver wins and recognition.
career.reversed: Overextension or scattered tasks sap results; prioritize and manage pace.

finance.upright: Focused budgeting and targeted action move you toward financial milestones.
finance.reversed: Impulsive purchases or competing goals derail plans; tighten controls and set a clear course.

health.upright: Consistency in training and routine produces tangible improvements.
health.reversed: Pushing too hard or losing structure risks setbacks; adjust intensity and plan.

spiritual.upright: Will aligned with purpose becomes a sacred vehicle for growth.
spiritual.reversed: Ego-driven striving obscures guidance; cultivate humility and centered intent.

RW-08-STRENGTH.name: Strength
RW-08-STRENGTH.description: Strength is Major Arcana VIII — the quiet power of grace in motion. In the Rider–Waite image, a serene woman in white gently closes the jaws of a golden lion; above her head floats the lemniscate, the sign of infinite spirit. A garland of roses circles her waist as distant mountains hold steady on the horizon. This is courage without cruelty, passion bridled by compassion, the tender mastery that tames the wild within.

meanings.upright: Calm, heart-centered courage overcomes brute force. You are invited to lead with compassion, trust your resilience, and channel passion into purposeful action.
meanings.reversed: Fear, frustration, or depleted confidence may be driving your choices. Step back, soothe the nervous system, and rebuild strength through kindness to yourself.

love.upright: Tenderness and trust soften defenses; love grows through patience and mutual respect.
love.reversed: Power struggles or jealousy flare when insecurity leads. Practice reassurance and avoid forcing outcomes.

career.upright: Steady leadership and calm under pressure. Your composed presence earns loyalty and progress.
career.reversed: Burnout or reactive decisions. Pace yourself and delegate before passion turns to volatility.

finance.upright: Responsible stewardship and disciplined choices strengthen long-term security.
finance.reversed: Impulse spending or attempting to force quick gains. Create boundaries and restore financial confidence.

health.upright: Resilience grows through balanced routines, gentle movement, and self-compassion.
health.reversed: Stress is taxing your system. Slow down, soothe the body, and seek supportive practices.

spiritual.upright: Integrate instinct and spirit; the heart’s courage becomes your guide.
spiritual.reversed: Doubt clouds your inner flame. Reconnect with practices that remind you of your inherent strength.

RW-09-HERMIT.name: The Hermit
RW-09-HERMIT.description: The Hermit is Major Arcana IX — the lamp of truth held aloft in the night. A cloaked elder stands upon a snowy peak, staff in one hand and a lantern in the other, its six-pointed star glowing within. The world falls away to silence as he searches inward, a patient pilgrim of wisdom. His light is both invitation and boundary: a guide for those ready to walk the solitary path to insight.

meanings.upright: Pause and turn inward; the answers you seek are lit by your own lantern. Solitude clarifies purpose and reveals the next step with quiet certainty.
meanings.reversed: Too much withdrawal can dim the light. Re-enter the world with what you’ve learned, or seek guidance if you feel unmoored.

love.upright: A need for reflective space strengthens authentic connection. Depth over drama.
love.reversed: Emotional distance or avoidance of intimacy. Share your inner world or risk growing apart.

career.upright: Independent study, research, or mentorship. Thoughtful strategy beats noise and haste.
career.reversed: Working in a silo or ignoring feedback. Seek counsel or collaboration to move forward.

finance.upright: Prudent, minimalist choices and careful analysis. Save, plan, and avoid trends.
finance.reversed: Overly cautious or uninformed decisions. Consult a trusted advisor and recheck assumptions.

health.upright: Quiet routines, rest, and mindful reflection support healing.
health.reversed: Isolation may hinder wellbeing. Reach out and balance inner work with community care.

spiritual.upright: A profound inner quest; your intuition becomes the teacher.
spiritual.reversed: Spiritual drift or navel-gazing. Ground insights in daily practice and service.

RW-10-WHEEL.name: Wheel of Fortune
RW-10-WHEEL.description: Wheel of Fortune is Major Arcana X — the turning wheel of fate. In the clouds, a great wheel marked with TORA and alchemical glyphs spins; a sphinx sits poised atop, a serpent descends, and Anubis rises on the rim. Around them, the winged guardians of the four corners study their books. Fortune’s wheel promises cycles, chances, and a cosmos alive with motion; what rises must one day fall, and fallings rise again.

meanings.upright: Life shifts; a turning point arrives. Ride the cycle with flexibility and faith, and seize the openings that appear.
meanings.reversed: Stalled momentum or unwelcome twists invite patience. Loosen your grip, recalibrate, and wait for the wheel to crest again.

love.upright: Serendipity sparks connections or renews passion. Be open to the unexpected.
love.reversed: On–off patterns or mixed signals. Don’t force timing; let clarity develop.

career.upright: A change in role, fortune, or visibility. Adapt quickly to capitalize on opportunity.
career.reversed: Delays or market shifts. Revise plans and control what you can: skill, attitude, readiness.

finance.upright: Fluctuations and lucky breaks are possible. Diversify and ride the cycle wisely.
finance.reversed: Unpredictability or losses. Avoid gambles; stabilize and plan for contingencies.

health.upright: Energy cycles upward; improvements through positive routine shifts.
health.reversed: Inconsistent progress. Small, steady habits reset the rhythm.

spiritual.upright: Synchronicities highlight your path; trust the orchestration.
spiritual.reversed: Feeling at the mercy of fate. Reclaim agency through surrender and mindful choice.

RW-11-JUSTICE.name: Justice
RW-11-JUSTICE.description: Justice is Major Arcana XI — the measured heart of truth. A regal figure sits between gray pillars, scales balanced in the left hand and an upright sword in the right. A veil hangs behind, hinting at deeper realities, while the red robe signifies the courage to act fairly. This card is cause and effect, honesty and accountability, the steady mirror that shows what is and asks what must be done.

meanings.upright: Align with truth and act with integrity. Decisions made now carry long echoes; weigh them with clarity and compassion.
meanings.reversed: Imbalance, partial truths, or evasions distort outcomes. Correct course, own your part, and seek transparency.

love.upright: Honest dialogue restores equilibrium. Agreements and boundaries strengthen trust.
love.reversed: One-sided effort or withheld truths. Clear the air before resentment hardens.

career.upright: Contracts, ethics, and fair procedures matter. Your credibility is your capital.
career.reversed: Office politics or skewed judgment. Document, advocate, and revisit the facts.

finance.upright: Balanced budgeting and fair deals. Read the fine print; act responsibly.
finance.reversed: Disputes or hidden terms. Seek advice and rectify errors promptly.

health.upright: Balance routine and rest; consistency yields results.
health.reversed: Habits out of balance. Reassess inputs and sustain what supports equilibrium.

spiritual.upright: Live your values; truth becomes practice.
spiritual.reversed: Cognitive dissonance. Realign beliefs and behavior with conscience.

RW-12-HANGED_MAN.name: The Hanged Man
RW-12-HANGED_MAN.description: The Hanged Man is Major Arcana XII — the still point between breaths. A figure hangs calmly upside down from a living tree, one leg crossed behind the other to form a four, a halo of enlightenment encircling his head. The world is inverted to invite a new view; surrender reveals what struggle obscures. This is the sacred pause where insight ripens.

meanings.upright: Release urgency and accept suspension. By letting go, you see differently and discover the path that effort alone could not reveal.
meanings.reversed: Resistance prolongs the pause. Stop sacrificing yourself without purpose; choose, or consciously wait with intention.

love.upright: A shift in perspective heals patterns. Patience and empathy renew connection.
love.reversed: Mixed signals or a stalemate. Don’t martyr your needs; seek clarity or step back.

career.upright: Reframe goals and strategies. Creative solutions arise when you suspend assumptions.
career.reversed: Project delays or indecision. Set criteria, make a call, or consciously put it on hold.

finance.upright: Pause big moves; assess value and trade-offs with fresh eyes.
finance.reversed: Money stuck due to avoidance. Untangle the knot with a clear plan.

health.upright: Rest and gentle stretches; healing deepens through surrender not strain.
health.reversed: Ignoring signs or over-sacrificing wellbeing. Commit to one supportive change.

spiritual.upright: A mystical inversion — surrender becomes revelation.
spiritual.reversed: Clinging to old views blocks insight. Practice letting go, one belief at a time.

RW-13-DEATH.name: Death
RW-13-DEATH.description: Death is Major Arcana XIII — the rider who clears the field for dawn. A skeletal figure in black armor advances on a white horse, bearing a banner with the white rose of purification. A king lies fallen; a child, a maiden, and a bishop behold the procession. Beyond, the sun rises between twin towers. This is not annihilation but inevitability: endings that usher in the next beginning.

meanings.upright: A chapter closes so a truer one can begin. Let what is complete fall away; the horizon holds new light.
meanings.reversed: Holding on tight prolongs the ache. Make space for change, and grief will turn into growth.

love.upright: A relationship transforms or completes. Honest endings or powerful renewals are possible.
love.reversed: Avoiding closure or change keeps love in limbo. Name the truth and choose.

career.upright: Job shifts, restructures, or purposeful exits clear the way for alignment.
career.reversed: Fear of transition stalls progress. Prepare, then step through the door.

finance.upright: Rebalancing resources and cutting losses. Simplify to rebuild stronger.
finance.reversed: Clinging to sunk costs. Accept the write-off and reorient.

health.upright: Ending harmful habits; embracing renewal supports vitality.
health.reversed: Resistance to needed changes. Gentle, consistent shifts are key.

spiritual.upright: Ego-shedding and deep renewal. A profound rite of passage.
spiritual.reversed: Fear of letting go curtails growth. Trust the passage and its promise.

RW-14-TEMPERANCE.name: Temperance
RW-14-TEMPERANCE.description: Temperance is Major Arcana XIV — the art of sacred blending. A radiant angel stands with one foot on land and one in water, pouring a shining stream between two cups in a perfect arc. A path leads toward a golden crown on the horizon. This is harmony through moderation, alchemy through patience, the healing middle way that marries opposites.

meanings.upright: Blend, don’t battle. With patience and care, disparate elements find a graceful mix that sustains long-term peace and progress.
meanings.reversed: Too much or too little unsettles the whole. Recalibrate the recipe; small adjustments restore flow.

love.upright: Compromise and emotional regulation deepen intimacy.
love.reversed: Heated extremes or withdrawal. Meet in the middle and slow the tempo.

career.upright: Teamwork, cross-skills, and steady process create elegant results.
career.reversed: Overextension or siloed efforts. Streamline and coordinate.

finance.upright: Balanced budgeting and diversified plans. Slow and steady wins.
finance.reversed: Spending swings or unsustainable cuts. Aim for moderate, consistent choices.

health.upright: Holistic routines and gradual changes promote healing.
health.reversed: All-or-nothing habits. Seek sustainable, gentle rhythm.

spiritual.upright: Integration of body, mind, and spirit; a calm, continuous practice.
spiritual.reversed: Fragmented focus. Reunite parts of yourself through simple daily rituals.

RW-15-DEVIL.name: The Devil
RW-15-DEVIL.description: The Devil is Major Arcana XV — the shadow enthroned. A horned figure with bat wings and an inverted pentagram presides over a chained couple whose bonds are loose enough to remove. Flames lick the black backdrop, hinting at appetites and fear. This card reveals bondage chosen or forgotten, the seduction of materialism and the power we give away when we forget we can choose differently.

meanings.upright: Confront the habits, cravings, or contracts that keep you small. Seeing the chain is the first act of freedom.
meanings.reversed: The lock clicks open; you are ready to step away from what binds. Commit to the path of conscious choice.

love.upright: Magnetism with strings attached: jealousy, control, or unhealthy patterns.
love.reversed: Healing codependency and renegotiating consent and boundaries.

career.upright: Golden handcuffs, toxic cultures, or workaholism. Name the cost.
career.reversed: Detaching from corrosive dynamics; redefining success on your terms.

finance.upright: Debt cycles or compulsive spending; allure of status purchases.
finance.reversed: Budget clarity and debt recovery; values-led money choices.

health.upright: Habits that undermine wellbeing. Seek support and honest inventory.
health.reversed: Breaking patterns and rebuilding resilience through steady care.

spiritual.upright: Shadow work: face fear, shame, and desire without judgment.
spiritual.reversed: Integration and release; compassion dissolves old chains.

RW-16-TOWER.name: The Tower
RW-16-TOWER.description: The Tower is Major Arcana XVI — the lightning that splits illusion. A crowned tower is struck and burning; figures tumble from its heights as flames shoot from shattered windows. The sky is black with shock, yet the strike is also revelation: false structures fall so truth can stand. Sudden, uncompromising change clears the way for what is real.

meanings.upright: Expect a jolt that rearranges everything. Though unsettling, this liberation dismantles what could not hold.
meanings.reversed: You may be delaying the inevitable or processing the shock within. Choose honesty and rebuild on bedrock.

love.upright: A truth bomb lands; dynamics change overnight. Authenticity first, then repair or release.
love.reversed: Tiptoeing around issues. Have the hard conversation to prevent a bigger break.

career.upright: Shake-ups, restructures, or abrupt pivots. Stay grounded and act decisively.
career.reversed: Quiet upheaval behind the scenes. Prepare, simplify, and protect essentials.

finance.upright: Unexpected expenses or market shocks. Stabilize, triage, and rebuild.
finance.reversed: Near-miss or manageable loss. Learn and fortify reserves.

health.upright: A wake-up call to change unsustainable patterns.
health.reversed: Integration after shock. Create supportive, steady routines.

spiritual.upright: Shattering of false beliefs; raw clarity arrives.
spiritual.reversed: Gentler deconstruction. Let go before life rips it away.

RW-17-STAR.name: The Star
RW-17-STAR.description: The Star is Major Arcana XVII — the quiet balm after the storm. A nude figure kneels by a pool, pouring water into the earth and back to the source, while a great eight-pointed star shines among seven smaller lights. A bird rests in a nearby tree; the night is gentle and vast. Hope, healing, and inspiration gather here like cool light upon the skin.

meanings.upright: Trust the slow return of light. Your spirit renews, creativity flows, and guidance arrives as calm assurance.
meanings.reversed: A dimming of hope calls for gentle care. Refill your well; seek beauty, rest, and honest encouragement.

love.upright: Tender healing and authentic vulnerability. A relationship can mend or deepen in truth.
love.reversed: Guarded hearts and low morale. Rebuild trust with small, consistent kindness.

career.upright: A guiding vision and receptive audience. Share your authentic voice.
career.reversed: Creative fatigue or self-doubt. Pace yourself and reconnect to purpose.

finance.upright: Gradual recovery and wise planning. Optimism rooted in realism.
finance.reversed: Discouragement skews choices. Reassess calmly and set modest goals.

health.upright: Restorative energies and gentle therapies aid recovery.
health.reversed: Fatigue or low mood. Prioritize sleep, hydration, and supportive care.

spiritual.upright: A sense of being guided; faith becomes a steady glow.
spiritual.reversed: Spiritual dryness. Return to simple practices that spark wonder.

RW-18-MOON.name: The Moon
RW-18-MOON.description: The Moon is Major Arcana XVIII — the dreaming road between towers. A pale moon gazes down, shedding drops of influence; a dog and a wolf howl from either side of a winding path, while a crayfish rises from the water’s edge. This is the realm of tides and instincts, of shadows that teach through mystery. Not all is as it seems, yet intuition knows the way.

meanings.upright: Feel into the fog rather than forcing clarity. Trust signals from dreams, body, and emotion; move gently and verify before acting.
meanings.reversed: The mist thins. Fears lose hold as you name them, and a truer picture comes into view.

love.upright: Heightened sensitivity and mixed messages. Seek emotional safety and honest check-ins.
love.reversed: Misunderstandings clear; secrets surface. Proceed with calm transparency.

career.upright: Ambiguous signals at work. Research, document, and trust your gut without leaping.
career.reversed: Hidden factors revealed. Plans firm up as doubts resolve.

finance.upright: Unclear expenses or fine print. Avoid speculation; illuminate details.
finance.reversed: Better visibility enables sound decisions and careful budgeting.

health.upright: Mind–body sensitivity is high. Gentle routines and stress reduction help.
health.reversed: Anxiety eases as you find reliable information and support.

spiritual.upright: Deep intuitive work, shadow exploration, potent dreams.
spiritual.reversed: Integration of insights; intuition becomes clearer and calmer.

RW-19-SUN.name: The Sun
RW-19-SUN.description: The Sun is Major Arcana XIX — the bright heart of life. A joyful child rides a white horse beneath a radiant sun, waving a red banner of vitality. Sunflowers bloom over a golden wall, turning their faces to warmth and clarity. This is success made simple, the exuberant yes that illuminates your path and nourishes growth.

meanings.upright: Confidence, clarity, and celebration. Step into visibility and let your authentic light be seen.
meanings.reversed: Joy is present but partially obscured. Simplify, recalibrate expectations, and tend your inner radiance.

love.upright: Playfulness and trust flourish; a relationship thrives in openness.
love.reversed: Small egos or mixed priorities dim the glow. Return to simple shared joys.

career.upright: Recognition, successful launches, or a breakthrough. Lead with transparency.
career.reversed: Minor delays or overpromising. Align results with clear, realistic goals.

finance.upright: Improved stability and confident planning. Growth through clear strategy.
finance.reversed: Expenses around fun or image creep up. Keep the light bright and the budget grounded.

health.upright: Vital energy rises; time outdoors and movement nourish.
health.reversed: Energy dips or burnout signals. Rest restores your shine.

spiritual.upright: A warm, heart-centered awakening; gratitude overflows.
spiritual.reversed: Reconnect with joy as a practice; let simple presence be your teacher.

RW-20-JUDGEMENT.name: Judgement
RW-20-JUDGEMENT.description: Judgement is Major Arcana XX — the trumpet of awakening. An angel sounds a horn from the sky, and figures rise from coffins, arms lifted toward a new day, mountains distant and clear. This is the call to account and to purpose: a reckoning that frees you from old stories and invites you into your true work.

meanings.upright: Hear the call and answer. Reflect honestly, forgive what has been, and step into a larger life.
meanings.reversed: Harsh self-judgment or delayed decisions keep you in limbo. Choose compassion and commit to the next chapter.

love.upright: Honest reckoning renews or completes a bond. Forgiveness and clarity lead forward.
love.reversed: Rehashing old wounds without resolution. Decide to heal, or to release.

career.upright: A vocation clarifies; promotions, pivots, or public moments arrive.
career.reversed: Second-guessing your path. Assess, decide, and take the step.

finance.upright: Account reviews, debt resolutions, or settlements. Clean the slate.
finance.reversed: Avoiding financial reality. Face the numbers and plan redemption.

health.upright: Renewal after a period of strain; lifestyle decisions bring fresh energy.
health.reversed: Inconsistency stalls progress. Commit to clear, compassionate routines.

spiritual.upright: A spiritual calling or initiation. You awaken to purpose.
spiritual.reversed: Muted inner voice. Create space to listen and respond.

RW-21-WORLD.name: The World
RW-21-WORLD.description: The World is Major Arcana XXI — the wreath of completion. A dancer moves within a laurel oval, holding twin wands, draped in a violet scarf that flows like infinity. In the four corners, the bull, lion, eagle, and angel watch — the fixed signs, the elements, the whole. This is fulfillment and integration, the journey become a circle and a doorway.

meanings.upright: A cycle concludes in triumph. Celebrate your growth, share your gifts, and step through to the next level.
meanings.reversed: One last thread needs weaving. Address the unfinished piece and the circle will close.

love.upright: A relationship reaches a mature, harmonious phase; for singles, readiness to meet as a whole person.
love.reversed: Old baggage delays intimacy. Seek closure and integration before advancing.

career.upright: Successful completion, graduation, or global reach. Your skills cohere into mastery.
career.reversed: Project stalls near the finish. Tighten details and align stakeholders.

finance.upright: Long-term goals culminate; diversified stability and confident planning.
finance.reversed: Outstanding obligations or scattered accounts. Consolidate and finalize.

health.upright: Holistic wellbeing; balanced body and mind.
health.reversed: A missing piece in the routine. Integrate rest, movement, and nourishment.

spiritual.upright: Integration of lessons; belonging to the greater web.
spiritual.reversed: Partial understanding. Reflect, synthesize, and embody your learning.

RW-ACE-WANDS.name: Ace of Wands
RW-ACE-WANDS.description: The Ace of Wands opens the suit of Fire with a hand emerging from a cloud, offering a living wand that sprouts fresh green leaves. Below, a river winds through fertile fields toward distant mountains and a small castle—promise glimmering on the horizon. This is the raw spark of creation, the first flare of passion and possibility, a sacred ignition that urges you to begin and let momentum catch flame.

meanings.upright: A fresh surge of energy arrives, inviting you to start, create, and move. This card signals ignition—follow the heat and trust the first bold step. Doors open when you answer inspiration with action.
meanings.reversed: The spark sputters: timing, fear, or misalignment may be stalling momentum. Refocus your energy, clear distractions, and rekindle purpose before pushing forward.

love.upright: Magnetic chemistry, a bold flirtation, or a passionate new beginning. Say yes to excitement while staying true to your intentions.
love.reversed: Attraction fizzles or fear blocks a promising connection. Slow down, clarify desire, and reignite the flame with presence.

career.upright: A green light for a project, startup, or visionary idea. Take initiative and let enthusiasm lead the way.
career.reversed: Creative blocks or a stalled launch. Rework the pitch, gather resources, and wait for a more aligned window.

finance.upright: New income opportunities or a venture with growth potential. Invest in what energizes you, with prudent planning.
finance.reversed: Risky impulses or delayed funding. Avoid rash spending; consolidate and prepare before committing.

health.upright: A burst of vitality—ideal for starting a fitness habit or energizing routine.
health.reversed: Fatigue or overexertion. Rest, hydrate, and rebuild gradually to prevent burnout.

spiritual.upright: A quickening of the spirit: follow the call, begin the practice, light the candle.
spiritual.reversed: A creative dry spell invites inner tending. Simplify, reconnect to wonder, and let the spark return.

RW-02-WANDS.name: Two of Wands
RW-02-WANDS.description: On the castle battlements, a figure in rich robes holds a globe and looks out over land and sea. One wand is fixed to the wall, the other rests in the hand—stability in one realm, ambition reaching into another. The horizon stretches wide: planning, partnering, and measured boldness shape the next venture.

meanings.upright: You’re surveying possibilities and mapping a path beyond familiar walls. Strategy, partnerships, and informed risk-taking set the stage for expansion.
meanings.reversed: Hesitation or narrow vision keeps you inside the comfort zone. Adjust the plan, widen the lens, or take a small step to break inertia.

love.upright: Conversations about the future, travel, or living arrangements. A partnership grows through shared vision.
love.reversed: Stagnation or long-distance logistics create doubt. Clarify expectations and timeline before proceeding.

career.upright: Strategic positioning, market research, and planning for growth. Align resources and prepare to launch.
career.reversed: Fear of exposure or unclear strategy. Reassess goals, gather data, and refine your approach.

finance.upright: Budgeting for expansion, education, or a calculated investment. Balance ambition with due diligence.
finance.reversed: Reluctance to invest or poor planning. Avoid speculative moves until the groundwork is solid.

health.upright: Create a manageable plan for long-term wellbeing; set milestones and track progress.
health.reversed: Procrastination undermines health goals. Begin with one small, sustainable change.

spiritual.upright: Choosing a path of study or practice; your worldview broadens with intention.
spiritual.reversed: Avoiding the call to grow. Explore safely but honestly where curiosity wants to lead.

RW-03-WANDS.name: Three of Wands
RW-03-WANDS.description: A traveler stands upon a cliff with three wands set firmly in the earth, gazing toward ships moving across a golden sea. The vision has left the drawing board; efforts are in motion. Horizons widen, allies align, and results begin to return from what you set in motion.

meanings.upright: Momentum builds as plans take shape beyond your immediate shore. Collaboration and foresight bring steady progress and tangible returns.
meanings.reversed: Temporary delays or narrow vision slow growth. Recalibrate logistics, seek broader perspectives, and allow time for tides to turn.

love.upright: Shared plans flourish—travel, moving forward, or expanding your world together.
love.reversed: Long-distance strains or mismatched timing. Patience and honest coordination are needed.

career.upright: Expansion, new markets, or successful delegation. Your leadership scales the vision.
career.reversed: Shipping, scheduling, or teamwork issues. Tidy processes and renegotiate timelines.

finance.upright: Returns begin to appear; investments or side ventures show promise.
finance.reversed: Payouts lag or profits are smaller than expected. Adjust strategy and reduce leakage.

health.upright: Steady improvement through consistent habits and support.
health.reversed: Minor setbacks. Keep perspective, refine routines, and persist.

spiritual.upright: A broadened outlook through travel, study, or new teachers. Integration follows exploration.
spiritual.reversed: Insularity limits growth. Seek diverse voices and widen spiritual horizons.

RW-04-WANDS.name: Four of Wands
RW-04-WANDS.description: Four wands rise like posts for a festive garland; beyond them, figures wave bouquets in celebration near a welcoming castle. This is a threshold of joy—homecoming, reunion, and the sweet solidity of belonging. Milestones are honored, and community makes success sing.

meanings.upright: Harmony and achievement are recognized and shared. A foundation has been laid; pause to revel in the warmth of community and the security of home.
meanings.reversed: The joy is quieter or postponed—perhaps celebrated privately or overshadowed by minor tensions. Tend the roots to restore ease.

love.upright: Commitment, engagement, or a happy event. A relationship feels supported and secure.
love.reversed: Family dynamics or living arrangements strain the bond. Keep celebration intimate and set healthy boundaries.

career.upright: A project reaches a successful checkpoint; team morale and recognition are high.
career.reversed: Lack of acknowledgment or office politics dims the win. Celebrate within your trusted circle.

finance.upright: Financial stability and wise planning around home or property.
finance.reversed: Home-related expenses or delays in moving/renovation. Budget carefully to reduce stress.

health.upright: Recovery supported by a peaceful environment and caring community.
health.reversed: Domestic stress affects wellbeing. Simplify your surroundings and reestablish routines.

spiritual.upright: Create sacred space, honor rites of passage, and practice gratitude.
spiritual.reversed: Energy at home feels unsettled. Cleanse, reorganize, and invite harmony back in.

RW-05-WANDS.name: Five of Wands
RW-05-WANDS.description: Five youths clash playfully with their wands, a tangle of limbs and crossed sticks against a bright sky. It is the roar of competition and the friction of differing views—more sparring than war. Through this lively chaos, skills are tested and voices learn to find rhythm together.

meanings.upright: Expect lively challenges and strong opinions. Healthy competition can sharpen your edge—if you keep it constructive and focused on learning.
meanings.reversed: Tension moves inward or begins to settle. Address core issues, clear the air, and channel energy into solutions rather than noise.

love.upright: Bickering or competing needs. Turn conflict into honest, fair dialogue.
love.reversed: Making peace after a rough patch—or suppressing what needs to be said. Choose clarity and kindness.

career.upright: A competitive field or brainstorming that borders on chaotic. Facilitate structure and roles.
career.reversed: Office drama cools or festers beneath the surface. Mediate openly to prevent flare-ups.

finance.upright: Competing expenses and priorities. Compare options and negotiate assertively.
finance.reversed: Disputes over money resolve through compromise. Avoid zero-sum thinking.

health.upright: Stress and scattered energy. Exercise or sport can channel it productively.
health.reversed: Relief from agitation—focus on calming practices and regular rest.

spiritual.upright: A test of will or conflicting beliefs. Seek dialogue and broaden understanding.
spiritual.reversed: Integration after inner struggle. Let humility guide reconciliation.

RW-06-WANDS.name: Six of Wands
RW-06-WANDS.description: A laurel-crowned rider advances on a white horse, his wand adorned with a wreath, as the crowd looks on. This is the parade of victory after trial—the moment when effort becomes visible and esteem is earned. Confidence and leadership shine, inviting others to believe as you do.

meanings.upright: Achievement is acknowledged publicly; you’ve carried the standard and won ground. Receive the praise, and use your platform to uplift others.
meanings.reversed: Validation is delayed or feels superficial. Guard against ego traps, steady your craft, and let substance anchor your shine.

love.upright: A relationship steps into the light—public support, pride in each other, shared wins.
love.reversed: Attention-seeking or comparison undermines intimacy. Seek genuine reassurance, not applause.

career.upright: Promotion, awards, or a successful launch. Lead with integrity and clarity.
career.reversed: Overlooked contributions or imposter syndrome. Document achievements and advocate fairly.

finance.upright: Bonuses, profitable outcomes, or a goal reached. Maintain smart stewardship.
finance.reversed: Status spending or overconfidence. Keep budgets realistic and long-term.

health.upright: A breakthrough or milestone: treatment works, stamina returns.
health.reversed: Plateau or pressure to perform. Celebrate small wins and rest deliberately.

spiritual.upright: Recognize your progress; gratitude multiplies grace.
spiritual.reversed: Practice humility. Let quiet devotion outlast public praise.

RW-07-WANDS.name: Seven of Wands
RW-07-WANDS.description: On a high ridge, a figure braces with a wand against six rising below, stance awkward, shoes mismatched—yet unshaken. This is the courage to hold your ground when challenged, to defend what’s been won, and to turn pressure into proof of conviction.

meanings.upright: You’ve reached higher ground; now protect it with clarity and resilience. Say no when needed and act from values, not fear.
meanings.reversed: Fatigue or insecurity weakens resolve. Choose your battles, seek support, and realign effort with what truly matters.

love.upright: Healthy boundaries strengthen trust. Stand firm on non-negotiables with compassion.
love.reversed: Hyper-defensiveness blocks closeness—or you’re conceding too much. Rebalance give and take.

career.upright: Defend your idea, negotiate terms, or hold a market position. Preparation wins the day.
career.reversed: Spread too thin or resisting feedback. Consolidate and collaborate strategically.

finance.upright: Protect assets, dispute unfair charges, or hold to your budget.
finance.reversed: Pressure from bills or legal issues. Seek advice and restructure obligations.

health.upright: Resilience and immune strength through consistent habits.
health.reversed: Exhaustion and stress. Rest, simplify, and ask for help.

spiritual.upright: Hold to your practice amid skepticism; conviction matures in challenge.
spiritual.reversed: Rigidity stifles growth. Loosen your grip and listen inwardly.

RW-08-WANDS.name: Eight of Wands
RW-08-WANDS.description: Eight wands streak diagonally through a clear sky above a river and green fields—pure motion with nothing to obstruct it. News travels, plans accelerate, and events align swiftly. Momentum gathers; aim well and let the current carry you.

meanings.upright: Things move fast—messages, travel, and decisions flow in a flurry of progress. Stay responsive, prioritize, and ride the surge.
meanings.reversed: Slowdowns, crossed wires, or logistical snags. Pause to clarify, streamline, and reset timing.

love.upright: Quickening romance, flirty messages, or sudden clarity. Let excitement unfold naturally.
love.reversed: Text lag, misunderstandings, or rushing commitments. Communicate simply and honestly.

career.upright: Rapid launches, busy inboxes, swift approvals. Organize and delegate to keep pace.
career.reversed: Bottlenecks or errors from haste. Recheck details and adjust timelines.

finance.upright: Fast transactions or timely payments. Capitalize on brief windows.
finance.reversed: Delays in payouts or transfers. Confirm terms and avoid impulse buys.

health.upright: Quick improvement or successful short-term protocols.
health.reversed: Overexertion or scattered routines. Slow down and recover properly.

spiritual.upright: Synchronicities and downloads arrive rapidly. Anchor insights with simple practices.
spiritual.reversed: Integration lags behind inspiration. Ground before the next leap.

RW-09-WANDS.name: Nine of Wands
RW-09-WANDS.description: A weary sentinel, head bandaged, clutches a wand while eight stand behind like a palisade. The eyes are watchful but unbroken. This is the grit to endure the final stretch, to honor your scars as proof of strength, and to guard what matters without hardening the heart.

meanings.upright: You’re close to the finish despite setbacks. Conserve energy, keep faith with your purpose, and pace the final push.
meanings.reversed: Walls are too high or strength is running low. Accept support, release hypervigilance, and prioritize recovery.

love.upright: A cautious heart heals while staying open. Protect your needs without closing the door.
love.reversed: Defenses choke intimacy—or you’re finally ready to let someone in. Communicate fears gently.

career.upright: Last hurdles before completion. Maintain boundaries and avoid scope creep.
career.reversed: Exhaustion or distrust of colleagues. Delegate and take restorative breaks.

finance.upright: Guard resources and stick to the plan; resilience pays off.
finance.reversed: Survival mode narrows choices. Seek counsel and restructure obligations.

health.upright: Steady recovery with mindful pacing. Avoid overdoing it.
health.reversed: Chronic stress signals a need for real rest and support.

spiritual.upright: Persevere in your practice; strength is tempered through trial.
spiritual.reversed: Fear-based rigidity. Invite softness and trust into your path.

RW-10-WANDS.name: Ten of Wands
RW-10-WANDS.description: Bent forward under a heavy bundle of ten wands, a figure trudges toward a town’s gate. The goal is near, but the load masks the path and strains the back. This is culmination through effort—and the wisdom to lighten what is no longer yours to carry.

meanings.upright: You shoulder many obligations as you approach completion. Simplify where possible and keep your eyes on the destination.
meanings.reversed: The weight is unsustainable. Let go, delegate, or reorder priorities before fatigue turns to fallout.

love.upright: Responsibilities press on romance; one partner may carry more. Share the load and schedule joy.
love.reversed: Put down old baggage and renegotiate roles. Compassionate boundaries revive connection.

career.upright: Overwork and task saturation. Consolidate, prioritize, and finish smart.
career.reversed: Delegate effectively or decline extra duties. Sustainability beats martyrdom.

finance.upright: Debt or financial pressure feels heavy. Create a structured, realistic payoff plan.
finance.reversed: Simplify accounts, reduce commitments, and seek relief options.

health.upright: Physical strain, tension in back or shoulders. Rest and ergonomic support are essential.
health.reversed: Recovery begins with shedding stressors and honoring limits.

spiritual.upright: Karmic lessons through service and endurance. Meaning grows when duty is chosen with heart.
spiritual.reversed: A ritual of release: lay down what isn’t yours and reclaim your fire.

RW-PAGE-WANDS.name: Page of Wands
RW-PAGE-WANDS.description: A court card of the Minor Arcana in the suit of Wands, the Page of Wands embodies first sparks and eager beginnings. In the Rider–Waite image, a bright-clad youth stands in a sun-baked desert dotted with distant pyramids, turning his face toward a budding staff as if hearing it speak. Salamander motifs dance across his tunic and a feather rises from his cap, hints of fire and aspiration. The barren sand contrasts with the green shoots on the wand, a promise that life can spring even from the most unlikely ground. This Page is the herald of new ideas and adventurous messages, the moment when curiosity ignites and the road ahead shimmers with possibility.

meanings.upright: Fresh inspiration arrives, urging you to explore, learn, and try. This is the bright call of curiosity and creative potential, inviting a courageous first step.
meanings.reversed: Energy is blocked or scattered; you may be second-guessing yourself or jumping from idea to idea. Slow down, ground your fire, and refine the message you want to carry.

love.upright: Flirtatious beginnings, playful texts, and a spark that feels promising. Be open, honest, and let the connection grow at its natural pace.
love.reversed: Mixed signals or immature behavior may disrupt romance. Avoid games; clarify intentions before investing your heart.

career.upright: A new project, study path, or role lights you up. Say yes to internships, training, or initiatives that grow your skills.
career.reversed: Lack of direction or impulsive pivots stall progress. Create a simple plan and commit to one step at a time.

finance.upright: Small opportunities for income or learning about money appear. Start modestly and build confidence through informed action.
finance.reversed: Inexperience may lead to impulsive purchases or risky dabbling. Educate yourself before committing resources.

health.upright: A new routine, class, or practice rekindles vitality. Keep it fun and sustainable to maintain momentum.
health.reversed: Start–stop patterns or impatience may undermine progress. Set realistic goals and listen to your body.

spiritual.upright: Signs, synchronicities, and messages spark a fresh path of growth. Follow your curiosity; journal what arrives.
spiritual.reversed: Doubt or distraction clouds the inner voice. Simplify rituals and return to the beginner’s mind.

RW-KNIGHT-WANDS.name: Knight of Wands
RW-KNIGHT-WANDS.description: A court card of the Minor Arcana in the suit of Wands, the Knight of Wands charges forward like living fire. In the Rider–Waite scene, a knight in armor, his tunic patterned with salamanders, lifts a sprouting wand as his horse rears against a desert horizon and distant pyramids. Plumes stream from his helmet, and dust rises in his wake; he is momentum personified, brave, charismatic, and hungry for new territory. This card is the thunderclap after the spark — the urge to move, to conquer hesitation, and to bring passion from thought into the open world.

meanings.upright: Bold movement and confident initiative propel you forward. Seize the moment, but channel your speed with purpose.
meanings.reversed: Rash choices or scattered efforts waste energy. Slow the pace, temper the fire, and align action with a clear plan.

love.upright: Passionate chemistry and whirlwind romance. Enjoy the heat while setting healthy boundaries and intentions.
love.reversed: Hot-and-cold behavior or a ‘player’ attitude sparks confusion. Ground the connection; demand consistency.

career.upright: Launches, pitches, travel, or a daring pivot bring progress. Lead with confidence and keep logistics tight.
career.reversed: Half-baked plans and impatience lead to misfires. Reassess timelines, reduce distractions, and finish what you start.

finance.upright: Money moves quickly — opportunities favor decisive yet calculated risks. Keep reserves for rapid changes.
finance.reversed: Speculative or ego-driven spending threatens stability. Avoid snap purchases and high-volatility bets.

health.upright: High energy supports fitness gains and active recovery. Warm up properly and respect limits to avoid strains.
health.reversed: Overexertion, inflammation, or minor accidents are more likely. Rest and structured training are essential.

spiritual.upright: A quest begins — retreats, pilgrimages, or brave practice changes call you forward. Act on your inspiration.
spiritual.reversed: Chasing thrills replaces depth. Return to intention and integrate lessons before the next leap.

RW-QUEEN-WANDS.name: Queen of Wands
RW-QUEEN-WANDS.description: A court card of the Minor Arcana in the suit of Wands, the Queen of Wands radiates confident warmth and sovereign creativity. In the Rider–Waite image, she sits upon a throne carved with lions, holding a flowering wand in one hand and a sunflower in the other, emblem of life and solar joy. At her feet rests a black cat, familiar and guardian, hinting at intuition beneath her bright presence. Sunflowers and golden tones surround her, a testament to courage, generosity, and the magic of a heart set ablaze with purpose.

meanings.upright: You shine with warm authority and creative vigor. Lead from the heart, uplift others, and act with charismatic integrity.
meanings.reversed: Your fire may be smothered by doubt or scattered by drama. Reclaim boundaries, replenish energy, and trust your inner sun.

love.upright: A vibrant, loyal, and supportive connection thrives. Express passion openly and honor mutual independence.
love.reversed: Possessiveness or attention-seeking sparks conflict. Temper pride, communicate needs, and reduce reactive behavior.

career.upright: You inspire teams and attract opportunities through presence and courage. Network boldly and champion creative solutions.
career.reversed: Office politics or overcommitting drains momentum. Delegate wisely and step back from unnecessary battles.

finance.upright: Confident budgeting with room for generosity. Investments in visibility, home, or creative ventures can flourish.
finance.reversed: Spending to impress or soothe anxiety backfires. Simplify plans and avoid performative purchases.

health.upright: Strong vitality and steady motivation. Activities that blend joy and movement keep your flame bright.
health.reversed: Burnout or hormonal stress calls for rest and warmth. Protect your energy and reduce overbooking.

spiritual.upright: Your intuition purrs beneath radiant self-belief. Rituals that celebrate creativity deepen your magic.
spiritual.reversed: Shadow themes of envy or comparison arise. Practice self-acceptance and re-center on authentic desire.

RW-KING-WANDS.name: King of Wands
RW-KING-WANDS.description: A court card of the Minor Arcana in the suit of Wands, the King of Wands is visionary fire mastered. In the Rider–Waite portrayal, he sits upright on a throne adorned with lions and salamanders, his cloak patterned with salamanders biting their tails — the fire that sustains itself. He holds a flowering staff like a scepter, and a small lizard crawls nearby, echoing resilience and transformation. His gaze is steady and forward, the look of one who sets direction and commands momentum without losing heart.

meanings.upright: You are called to lead with courage, clarity, and big-picture vision. Take command, inspire action, and stand by your principles.
meanings.reversed: Force without empathy undermines authority. Replace knee-jerk reactions with strategy, and channel passion into constructive leadership.

love.upright: A passionate, protective, and decisive partner sets a steady course. Be clear about goals and nurture mutual respect.
love.reversed: Control, impatience, or pride strain connection. Share power, cool tempers, and practice active listening.

career.upright: Entrepreneurial moves and visionary strategy pay off. Rally others, delegate well, and scale with purpose.
career.reversed: Micromanagement, snap judgments, or ego clashes stall progress. Build consensus and refine the long game.

finance.upright: Long-term growth through strong leadership and calculated risks. Align investments with values and strategy.
finance.reversed: Rigid stances or ego-driven bets create volatility. Seek counsel and avoid grandstanding with money.

health.upright: Discipline and willpower support robust stamina. A structured plan keeps energy high and focused.
health.reversed: Overwork or anger-related tension affects wellbeing. Incorporate stress relief and avoid pushing past limits.

spiritual.upright: Mastery of will serves a larger purpose. Lead by example and kindle courage in your community.
spiritual.reversed: Dogmatism dims the flame. Reopen to feedback, humility, and the wisdom of shared fire.

RW-ACE-CUPS.name: Ace of Cups
RW-ACE-CUPS.description: The Ace of Cups opens the Suit of Cups in the Minor Arcana, a holy vessel of the heart overflowing with possibility. In the Rider–Waite image, a divine hand emerges from a cloud, offering a golden chalice that spills five shimmering streams into a tranquil pool dotted with lotuses. A white dove descends toward the cup with a wafer of blessing, suggesting grace, peace, and a direct infusion of spirit into feeling — the first swell of love, intuition, and creative life.

meanings.upright: A fresh wave of emotion, connection, and inspiration arrives, inviting your heart to open. Let feeling flow; there is love and creative grace to receive.
meanings.reversed: The heart’s cup feels closed or depleted, asking for gentleness and replenishment. Attend to self-love and allow release so feeling can flow again.

love.upright: New romance or a heartfelt renewal breathes tenderness and trust into connection.
love.reversed: Guardedness or old wounds block intimacy; heal and soften before proceeding.

career.upright: A creatively nourishing project or team environment emerges, boosting morale and inspiration.
career.reversed: Emotional burnout or misalignment at work; step back to reconnect with purpose.

finance.upright: Kindness, gifts, or supportive opportunities appear; invest where your heart is engaged.
finance.reversed: Mood-based spending or uncertain priorities; ground decisions and set gentle limits.

health.upright: Renewed vitality and emotional wellbeing; hydration, rest, and care bring balance.
health.reversed: Low mood or depletion signals the need for nurturing routines and compassionate support.

spiritual.upright: A heart-opening blessing and direct experience of the sacred; trust the flow of grace.
spiritual.reversed: Feeling disconnected; restore ritual, quiet, and self-compassion to refill your cup.

RW-02-CUPS.name: Two of Cups
RW-02-CUPS.description: The Two of Cups in the Minor Arcana celebrates meeting in the middle — the moment two hearts recognize each other. In the Rider–Waite scene, a man and woman exchange cups as a caduceus rises between them, crowned by a red lion, symbolizing healed exchange, passion, and sacred accord. The air shimmers with the promise of reciprocity and the harmony that grows when trust is offered and received.

meanings.upright: A balanced partnership forms or deepens, marked by mutual respect and shared feeling. This is the medicine of meeting halfway and choosing connection.
meanings.reversed: A bond is out of balance or strained by miscommunication or unequal effort. Recalibrate boundaries and restore honest dialogue.

love.upright: Soulful chemistry and commitment grow through openhearted exchange.
love.reversed: Mixed signals or unequal investment; clarify needs and restore equilibrium.

career.upright: A fair deal, mentorship, or collaboration where both parties benefit.
career.reversed: Partnership tensions or incompatible styles; revisit terms and roles.

finance.upright: Equitable agreements and shared budgeting strengthen security.
finance.reversed: Uneven contributions or risky lending to loved ones; set clear terms.

health.upright: Supportive care and accountability partners aid recovery and balance.
health.reversed: Stress from relational conflict impacts wellbeing; seek mediation and self-care.

spiritual.upright: Inner masculine and feminine energies harmonize; relationships mirror healing.
spiritual.reversed: An inner split seeks reconciliation; cultivate self-trust and integration.

RW-03-CUPS.name: Three of Cups
RW-03-CUPS.description: A Minor Arcana hymn to friendship and shared joy, the Three of Cups shows three women dancing in a circle, their goblets raised. In the Rider–Waite image, ripe fruit and gourds lie at their feet, a harvest of abundance that community brings. Laughter, music, and celebration braid together, reminding us that joy multiplies when it’s poured for others.

meanings.upright: Communal happiness and shared success arrive; gather, toast, and give thanks. Let connection be the cup that refills you.
meanings.reversed: Too much partying or social friction drains energy. Choose authentic company and healthy boundaries.

love.upright: Happy milestones, dates with friends, or joyful gatherings strengthen bonds.
love.reversed: Third-party complications or meddling friends; protect the intimacy of the relationship.

career.upright: Team wins and enthusiastic networking; collaboration bears fruit.
career.reversed: Cliques or unhelpful chatter; refocus on shared goals and professionalism.

finance.upright: Bonuses, shared resources, or celebrating financial progress.
finance.reversed: Overspending on nights out, events, or keeping up appearances.

health.upright: Recovery supported by community, movement, and joyful routines.
health.reversed: Overindulgence or late nights sap vitality; balance fun with rest.

spiritual.upright: A circle, coven, or group practice uplifts your spirit.
spiritual.reversed: Superficial connections; seek soulful community and purpose-driven ritual.

RW-04-CUPS.name: Four of Cups
RW-04-CUPS.description: The Four of Cups, a Minor Arcana card of the Suit of Cups, sits in contemplative stillness. In the Rider–Waite image, a figure under a tree stares at three cups while a fourth is quietly offered by a hand from a cloud, unnoticed. The scene hums with boredom and introspection, the pause in which desire questions itself and a subtle gift waits to be seen.

meanings.upright: You may be disengaged, focused on what isn’t satisfying and missing a quiet offering. Step inward to clarify desire, then look again with fresh eyes.
meanings.reversed: A stir of interest returns and you’re ready to say yes. New options appear as you shift into gratitude and presence.

love.upright: Emotional withdrawal or boredom; honor your needs and communicate.
love.reversed: A renewed willingness to connect or explore new dating possibilities.

career.upright: Stagnation or lack of motivation; a promising project may be overlooked.
career.reversed: Energy returns; seize the offer that aligns with your values.

finance.upright: Cautious or indifferent to new opportunities; review options thoughtfully.
finance.reversed: A timely chance becomes visible; act with measured optimism.

health.upright: Lethargy or emotional flatness; gentle routines and nature time help.
health.reversed: Momentum builds; small, consistent changes lift mood and energy.

spiritual.upright: A quiet period of reflection; the next step is subtle and inward.
spiritual.reversed: Fresh inspiration and a nudge from spirit rekindle devotion.

RW-05-CUPS.name: Five of Cups
RW-05-CUPS.description: The Five of Cups, a Minor Arcana lesson in grief and perspective, shows a cloaked figure fixated on three spilled cups. In the Rider–Waite landscape, two cups still stand behind them, and a bridge leads across a river to a distant dwelling — loss and possibility coexisting. The card pauses at the threshold where mourning can soften into meaning.

meanings.upright: A sorrow or setback weighs heavily, narrowing your gaze to what’s gone. Yet something remains; turn gently to what still stands.
meanings.reversed: Grief loosens its hold, allowing forgiveness and forward motion. What was lost becomes a teacher rather than a jailer.

love.upright: Heartbreak or disappointment lingers; honor the feelings without dwelling forever.
love.reversed: Reconciliation or closure becomes possible as perspective softens.

career.upright: A project fails or an opportunity slips; learn, regroup, and cross the bridge to the next stage.
career.reversed: Recovery after a misstep; constructive feedback guides improvement.

finance.upright: Losses or buyer’s remorse; avoid doubling down from despair.
finance.reversed: Stabilization and modest recovery through practical adjustments.

health.upright: Low mood affects vitality; grief work and support are medicine.
health.reversed: Therapy, rest, and compassion ease symptoms and renew strength.

spiritual.upright: A dark night of the soul invites honest feeling and surrender.
spiritual.reversed: Light returns as meaning is found; gratitude coexists with sorrow.

RW-06-CUPS.name: Six of Cups
RW-06-CUPS.description: The Six of Cups, a Minor Arcana ode to innocence and memory, shows children sharing flowers in cups within a quiet courtyard. In the Rider–Waite scene, a child offers a cup filled with white blossoms to another, while the old house and a distant figure suggest time’s gentle passage. Kindness, nostalgia, and the sweetness of simple moments open like a well-kept garden.

meanings.upright: A tender return to simpler joys, past connections, or healing memories. Acts of kindness and familiarity nourish the heart.
meanings.reversed: The past may be holding you too tightly or tinted by idealization. Bless what was and make room for who you are becoming.

love.upright: Sweet reconnection or a relationship marked by gentleness and play.
love.reversed: Stuck on an ex or childish dynamics; mature the bond or move on.

career.upright: Mentorship, a supportive workplace, or returning to a beloved skill.
career.reversed: Outdated methods or resistance to change; update your toolkit.

finance.upright: Modest stability, gifts, or help from family roots.
finance.reversed: Clinging to old valuations or budgets; modernize and plan ahead.

health.upright: Gentle routines and play support healing; tend the inner child.
health.reversed: Past patterns affect health; seek to unwind inherited habits.

spiritual.upright: Ancestral blessings and childlike wonder reopen the heart.
spiritual.reversed: Do inner-child work to reconcile memory with present truth.

RW-07-CUPS.name: Seven of Cups
RW-07-CUPS.description: The Seven of Cups in the Minor Arcana unveils a sky of possibilities as a figure gazes at seven cups floating in cloud. In the Rider–Waite image, each cup holds a tempting vision — jewels, a laurel wreath, a castle, a dragon, a snake, a veiled figure, a beautiful face — fantasies and fears mingled. The moment is rich with imagination and risk: choose with wisdom, or be chosen by illusion.

meanings.upright: So many paths beckon that focus blurs; not all glitter is gold. Discern values, test assumptions, and pick one true cup.
meanings.reversed: Fog lifts and priorities crystallize. Commit to a clear choice and channel energy into tangible steps.

love.upright: Many suitors or daydreams; avoid projecting fantasies onto partners.
love.reversed: Choose the relationship that is real and reciprocal; set firm boundaries.

career.upright: Brainstorming abounds, but scope creep threatens progress; define criteria.
career.reversed: Streamline to an achievable plan or MVP and execute.

finance.upright: Speculative schemes tempt; verify before investing.
finance.reversed: A sober budget and simple strategy restore stability.

health.upright: Overwhelm about treatments or routines; seek trusted guidance.
health.reversed: Select one approach and stick with it to see results.

spiritual.upright: Psychic and imaginative influx; ground visions in practice.
spiritual.reversed: Discernment strengthens; cultivate a focused, embodied path.

RW-08-CUPS.name: Eight of Cups
RW-08-CUPS.description: The Eight of Cups, a Minor Arcana pilgrimage, shows a traveler leaving behind eight neatly stacked cups beneath a moonlit sky. In the Rider–Waite image, staff in hand, they turn toward mountains and the unknown, accepting that what once satisfied no longer does. It is the quiet courage to depart in search of deeper meaning.

meanings.upright: You are called to leave a hollow comfort for a more authentic path. Trust the pull toward what matters more than what is familiar.
meanings.reversed: Staying put out of fear or habit delays growth, or you may circle back to finish unfinished business. Name what you seek and take one honest step.

love.upright: Departing an unfulfilling bond or taking space to reevaluate needs.
love.reversed: Staying for the wrong reasons; confront avoidance and speak your truth.

career.upright: A purposeful pivot, sabbatical, or resignation to pursue meaning.
career.reversed: Golden handcuffs or drifting between jobs; clarify direction.

finance.upright: Letting go of sunk costs and redirecting resources wisely.
finance.reversed: Clinging to poor investments; make a clean, strategic exit.

health.upright: Stepping away from draining habits; retreat supports healing.
health.reversed: Avoiding root causes; seek guidance and commit to change.

spiritual.upright: A quest for deeper truth; solitude and pilgrimage call.
spiritual.reversed: Resisting the call; create a small daily practice to begin.

RW-09-CUPS.name: Nine of Cups
RW-09-CUPS.description: The Nine of Cups, a Minor Arcana emblem of contentment, shows a satisfied figure seated before a graceful arc of nine cups. In the Rider–Waite image, arms crossed and posture proud, they bask in the glow of wishes fulfilled and pleasures earned. The air is ripe with gratitude, inviting you to savor the feast you set for yourself.

meanings.upright: A heartfelt wish comes true; enjoy the sweetness fully and gratefully. Pleasure is a portal to deeper appreciation.
meanings.reversed: Surface pleasures fail to satisfy or excess dulls joy. Seek authenticity and remember what truly nourishes.

love.upright: Warmth, sensuality, and mutual enjoyment flourish.
love.reversed: Self-centeredness or taking love for granted; practice appreciation.

career.upright: Recognition and a comfortable rhythm; celebrate your craft.
career.reversed: Complacency or vanity; set fresh goals and stay humble.

finance.upright: Comfortable resources and small luxuries are within reach.
finance.reversed: Overspending on treats; align purchases with true values.

health.upright: Overall wellbeing improves; balanced pleasures support vitality.
health.reversed: Excess food, drink, or leisure affects health; recalibrate.

spiritual.upright: Gratitude practice deepens contentment and presence.
spiritual.reversed: Spiritual materialism; return to sincerity and service.

RW-10-CUPS.name: Ten of Cups
RW-10-CUPS.description: The Ten of Cups crowns the Suit of Cups in the Minor Arcana with a vision of lasting harmony. In the Rider–Waite scene, a rainbow of ten cups arches above a couple with arms raised as children dance nearby, a home and river completing the pastoral peace. This is emotional fulfillment that extends outward — love woven into family, community, and place.

meanings.upright: A season of deep contentment and belonging arrives, blessing home and relationships. Values align, and love ripples outward.
meanings.reversed: Cracks in the ideal appear or values clash under the roof. Address expectations honestly and rebuild shared harmony.

love.upright: Commitment, family milestones, and a secure, tender bond.
love.reversed: Tension at home or competing priorities; realign on what truly matters.

career.upright: Supportive culture and work-life harmony; purpose and people fit together.
career.reversed: Toxic dynamics or imbalance drains family life; set boundaries or seek better alignment.

finance.upright: Stable household finances and shared goals create ease.
finance.reversed: Money disputes or unequal expectations; craft a compassionate plan.

health.upright: A peaceful, supportive environment strengthens wellbeing.
health.reversed: Family stress impacts health; cultivate calm and mutual care.

spiritual.upright: A sense of belonging to something larger — community, lineage, or love itself.
spiritual.reversed: Reevaluate inherited ideals; define your own vision of fulfillment.

RW-PAGE-CUPS.name: Page of Cups
RW-PAGE-CUPS.description: A Court card of the Minor Arcana, the Page of Cups embodies the first stirring of feelings within the suit of water. In the Rider–Waite image, a youthful figure stands on the shoreline in a patterned tunic and soft, beret-like cap, surprised and delighted as a fish peeks from the golden cup he raises. Gentle waves roll behind him, carrying whispers of dreams and synchronicities. This is the spark of emotion and imagination, the moment when intuition speaks in playful, unexpected ways and the heart learns a new language.

meanings.upright: Fresh emotional energy, messages of the heart, and creative nudges arise. Be receptive to signs, dreams, and gentle invitations that awaken wonder. Approach life with curiosity and a tender, imaginative spirit.
meanings.reversed: Feelings may be raw or misdirected, and intuition hard to trust. Immaturity, insecurity, or avoidance can muddle messages. Ground yourself, set gentle boundaries, and practice honest emotional expression.

love.upright: Sweet beginnings, crushes, and heartfelt gestures. Vulnerability and sincere communication open a tender path forward.
love.reversed: Immature exchanges, mixed signals, or fantasy replacing real connection. Slow down, clarify intentions, and protect your heart.

career.upright: A creative offer, study opportunity, or project that invites imagination. Be teachable and share your ideas with openness.
career.reversed: Unclear expectations, procrastination, or fragile confidence at work. Seek mentorship, refine skills, and set realistic goals.

finance.upright: Small but positive news about money or a new income idea. Nurture it patiently and learn as you go.
finance.reversed: Impulsive purchases or wishful budgeting. Create a simple plan and avoid emotional spending.

health.upright: Gentle self-care and mind–body awareness support healing. Listen to dreams and your body’s subtle cues.
health.reversed: Moodiness or avoidance of health matters. Name your feelings, seek support, and take one small practical step.

spiritual.upright: Heightened intuition, meaningful coincidences, and vivid dreams. Begin a practice that honors your inner child and creativity.
spiritual.reversed: Confusion or self-doubt clouds guidance. Simplify your practice, journal your feelings, and rebuild trust in your inner voice.

RW-KNIGHT-CUPS.name: Knight of Cups
RW-KNIGHT-CUPS.description: A Court card of the Minor Arcana, the Knight of Cups rides forth as the poet of the suit of water. In the Rider–Waite scene, an armored knight on a calm, white horse advances with measured grace, bearing a single cup like a sacred offering. Winged motifs at his helmet and boots hint at elevated vision, while a winding stream and gentle landscape suggest feelings in motion. He is a messenger of romance, inspiration, and the quest to follow the heart with honor.
